aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: Being a frontend programmer with 2 years of experience in Javascript, HTML and CSS, I am able to create intuitive and dynamic user interfaces that offer an exceptional user experience. In addition, the acquired skills to work in a team and communicate effectively allow me to collaborate with other developers and designers to create unique and customized solutions for each project.In summary, I am passionate about web design and development, and I am committed to offering innovative and effective solutions for each of my clients.
